title: Hello World
content: What you read here is a first post of an elaborate plan to get started learning some new skills. My goal with this website is to learn all kinds of techniques related to software development, web programming and everything around it. When you are reading this I have already set up some basic website page and added some front-end code using Svelte (https://svelte.dev/), I have added a minimal design using Bootstrap, and arranged some hosting and namespace.There are a lot of things I want to experiment with on this site. For starters I would like to have this page look nice and add some features to make it feel like an enjoyable site. Next it would be nice if I could easily add some stories and manage the content of the site a little bit. After that I can go any direction I like and experiment a little bit.
